analysis.description:
BCFLeague.calculateGoalsFromAttributeTotals (/unique_chucks/18/0x89b3efa63648b65bc2999bbb4f82bfed5f83f178.sol#395-462) uses a dangerous strict equality:
	- attackingTeamId == homeTeamId
	- outcome == defendingTeamId
	- outcome == defendingTeamId
	- outcome == defendingTeamId
	- attackingTeamId == homeTeamId

Reentrancy in BCFLeague.calculateMatchOutcomesForRoundId (/unique_chucks/18/0x89b3efa63648b65bc2999bbb4f82bfed5f83f178.sol#212-248):
	External calls:
	- (homeScorers,awayScorers) = calculateScorersForTeamIds(_match.homeTeamId,_match.awayTeamId) (/unique_chucks/18/0x89b3efa63648b65bc2999bbb4f82bfed5f83f178.sol#235-237)
	State variables written after the call(s):
	- roundIdToMatches (/unique_chucks/18/0x89b3efa63648b65bc2999bbb4f82bfed5f83f178.sol#244)
	- roundIdToMatches (/unique_chucks/18/0x89b3efa63648b65bc2999bbb4f82bfed5f83f178.sol#244-247)
	- roundIdToMatches (/unique_chucks/18/0x89b3efa63648b65bc2999bbb4f82bfed5f83f178.sol#247-248)
	- teams (/unique_chucks/18/0x89b3efa63648b65bc2999bbb4f82bfed5f83f178.sol#238-240)

Reentrancy in BCFLeague.enterLeague (/unique_chucks/18/0x89b3efa63648b65bc2999bbb4f82bfed5f83f178.sol#296-335):
	External calls:
	- require(bool)(mainContract.isOwnerOfAllPlayerCards(cardIds,msg.sender)) (/unique_chucks/18/0x89b3efa63648b65bc2999bbb4f82bfed5f83f178.sol#303-306)
	State variables written after the call(s):
	- cardIdToEntryStatus (/unique_chucks/18/0x89b3efa63648b65bc2999bbb4f82bfed5f83f178.sol#327)
	- competitionStatus (/unique_chucks/18/0x89b3efa63648b65bc2999bbb4f82bfed5f83f178.sol#333-334)
	- managerToTeamId (/unique_chucks/18/0x89b3efa63648b65bc2999bbb4f82bfed5f83f178.sol#322-323)
	- teams (/unique_chucks/18/0x89b3efa63648b65bc2999bbb4f82bfed5f83f178.sol#321)
_team in BCFLeague.enterLeague (/unique_chucks/18/0x89b3efa63648b65bc2999bbb4f82bfed5f83f178.sol#316) is a local variable never initialiazed
_match in BCFLeague.generateFixtures (/unique_chucks/18/0x89b3efa63648b65bc2999bbb4f82bfed5f83f178.sol#174-175) is a local variable never initialiazed

BCFLeague.calculateAttributeTotals has external calls inside a loop:
	- (overall,pace,shooting,passing,dribbling,defending,physical) = mainContract.getPlayerForCard(_team.cardIds[i]) (/unique_chucks/18/0x89b3efa63648b65bc2999bbb4f82bfed5f83f178.sol#473-476)

BCFLeague.settleLeague has external calls inside a loop:
	- winner.transfer(winningAmount) (/unique_chucks/18/0x89b3efa63648b65bc2999bbb4f82bfed5f83f178.sol#642)

Reentrancy in BCFLeague.BCFLeague (/unique_chucks/18/0x89b3efa63648b65bc2999bbb4f82bfed5f83f178.sol#128-158):
	External calls:
	- require(bool)(candidateDataStoreContract.implementsERC721()) (/unique_chucks/18/0x89b3efa63648b65bc2999bbb4f82bfed5f83f178.sol#156-157)
	State variables written after the call(s):
	- mainContract (/unique_chucks/18/0x89b3efa63648b65bc2999bbb4f82bfed5f83f178.sol#157-158)

Reentrancy in BCFLeague.setMainContract (/unique_chucks/18/0x89b3efa63648b65bc2999bbb4f82bfed5f83f178.sol#368-373):
	External calls:
	- require(bool)(candidateContract.implementsERC721()) (/unique_chucks/18/0x89b3efa63648b65bc2999bbb4f82bfed5f83f178.sol#371)
	State variables written after the call(s):
	- mainContract (/unique_chucks/18/0x89b3efa63648b65bc2999bbb4f82bfed5f83f178.sol#371-373)

Deprecated standard detected @ /unique_chucks/18/0x89b3efa63648b65bc2999bbb4f82bfed5f83f178.sol#509:
	- Usage of "block.blockhash()" should be replaced with "blockhash()"

Deprecated standard detected @ /unique_chucks/18/0x89b3efa63648b65bc2999bbb4f82bfed5f83f178.sol#526-527:
	- Usage of "block.blockhash()" should be replaced with "blockhash()"

Parameter '_address' of BCFLeague.setMainContract (/unique_chucks/18/0x89b3efa63648b65bc2999bbb4f82bfed5f83f178.sol#370) is not in mixedCase
